f1e80e4ecae727087ca135dfd02f72e2d6213efb.commitMessage:
Rename variables with 'standard' names of unexpected types. #1555

Fixes `StandardVariableNames` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on any variables with 'standard' names which are of unexpected types. Such names may be confusing. Standard names and types are as follows:
* i, j, k, m, n - int
* f - float
* d - double
* b - byte
* c, ch - char
* l - long
* s, str - String

ca634f7cafbf0d8f21eac1c4badacbe2f3cf8832.commitMessage:
Replace `StringBuffer` with `StringBuilder` to improve performance

Thread-safety given by `StringBuffer` doesn't give any benefit when used within one method, so in such cases `StringBuilder` is safe and more efficient replacement.
